reviews.review_msg: Harald is a good prof. He's a fair marker and his lectures are very clear. He has many quizzes that sort of just appear throughout the semester (usually a week in advance). Watch out for those quizzes, they can be quite tricky. His exams are longer but straightforward. Really funny guy, says "idk" a lot and basically called a study trash in lecture

He was amazing and understanding. It was very lecture heavy and he told you all the information you needed to know. He provided chapters to read from the textbooks but it was not required. His notes were a little bare boned and hard to understand so you have to attend class to understand. He gave us everything to succeed and guided our focus.
